授業目的:
The objectives of this course are:
1. To help students acquire academic skills, with a focus on reading and writing
2. To help students develop study skills for higher education
到達目標:
1. Students will become better essay-writers.
2. Students will acquire note-taking skills.
3. Students will develop their reading, writing and study skills.
4. Students will gain academic vocabulary knowledge.
授業方法:
1.This course will be conducted in English only and English will be the means of communication between the students and the instructor.
2. Zoom meeting will be held every week from the second session(details will be provided in the class material for the first session ).
3. Written class materials, instructions and assignments for each session will be posted and become available through LUNA Class Material/Assignment on demand （「教材・課題」欄）by the actual class time each week.
＊Check email and LUNA「お知らせ」before the session each week; there may be important messages about the class.

第1回: Check LUNA 「教材・課題」section for the class material.
